headline: GE HealthCare and NVIDIA reimagine diagnostic imaging with autonomous X-ray and ultrasound solutions
summary: SAN JOSE, Calif., March 18, 2025--GE HealthCare (Nasdaq: GEHC) today announced a collaboration with NVIDIA at GTC 2025, expanding the existing relationship between the two companies to focus on pioneering innovation in autonomous imaging, beginning with autonomous X-ray technologies and autonomous applications within ultrasound.
